body: I can see the manipulation of MC from FeMC almost an entire light year away.
@zombieadd,no,thank you.You saved my time.i dont want to read this godtier garbage.Anyway,i appreciate your spoiler👍

Scout here without too much spoilers: I skimmed thru the raws all the way thru chapter 20. There is no sign of NTR, rape, blackmail, etc. There is plenty of drama as typical of manhwas, more towards the corporate office setting. Here is my take on what I saw about the characters: MC is a simp to FMC. There are various sex scenes from many characters: girls will act like "whores" and guys will act like "whoremongers". MC will have a gf and will fuck it up. FMC is a manipulative bitch. There will be many interventions from side characters, whether it's sex-related or something else. About artwork: it is absolutely top-notch, and in fact, this one makes a good fapping material if you need. So that's all folks, that's all I have to say and I'm sorry that I can't hide spoilers in these comments (I believe there is no such feature here?). PEACE.
@Jimmyfink: It's called "Pushover" in other sites, but it's also known as "Escape" in another site with the raws in kraw.
I'll just wait for this to get more chapters. Idk why but manhwa NTR hits different than japanese NTR which i can take as long they give a satisfying fap.
